summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 32115, creating Local Improvement District No. 2728, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Surber Avenue and Surber Place from the south margin of East Forty-fifth Street to the intersection of Surber Place with Laurel Avenue, by paving the same with Dolarway pavement with a five-inch concrete base, all in accordance with Majority Petition File No. 52148 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", approved November 13th, 1913 and published November 18th, 1913.
